GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /users/:username.description: serves an individual user based on the username given

GET /articles/:article_id.description: serves an invividual article based on the article ID given

PATCH /articles/:article_id.description: updates the number of votes an article has

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for the given article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: sends a new comment to the website

GET /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves up a comment based on its id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the number of votes a comment has
